Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 59th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1981...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1985, off Dave Stieb (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/16/1985, off Larry Christenson (NYM)...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Injured on 6/15/1989 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
Injured on 9/11/1990 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/8/1991 to a 3-year deal worth $600,000 per year...
